title: State Effecter Initialization PDR (DSP0248 Type 12)
description: Per DSP0248 v1.3.0 Clause 28.14 and DSP0240 v1.2.0 Section 2.5

PDRType.description: uint8; PDR Type 12 = State Effecter Initialization

dataLength.description: uint16; Length of data following this header (calculated automatically).

PLDMTerminusHandle.description: uint16; A handle that identifies PDRs that belong to a particular PLDM terminus

effecterID.description: uint16; ID of the effecter relative to the given PLDM terminus

entityType.description: uint16; Deprecated - set to 0. The Type value for the entity that is associated with this effecter.

entityInstanceNumber.description: uint16; Deprecated - set to 0. The Instance Number for the entity that is associated with this effecter.

containerID.description: uint16; Deprecated - set to 0. The containerID for the containing entity that is associated with this effecter.

initConditions.description: bitfield8; Identifies the conditions under which the Initialization Agent must initialize or reinitialize this effecter. Bits [7:5] reserved.

effecterEnable.description: enum8; The operational state of the overall composite state effecter after it has been initialized. Special: 0xFF = do not set.

effecterInitMask.description: bitfield8; Identifies which effecters within the composite state effecter require initialization.

effecterOpStateEventEnableMask.description: bitfield8; Identifies which effecters within the composite state effecter should have their operational state event message generation enabled after initialization.

stateValue0.description: uint8; State value to write to effecter offset 0 for initialization. Special: 0x00 as placeholder if not required.

stateValue1.description: uint8; State value to write to effecter offset 1 for initialization. Special: 0x00 as placeholder if not required.

stateValue2.description: uint8; State value to write to effecter offset 2 for initialization. Special: 0x00 as placeholder if not required.

stateValue3.description: uint8; State value to write to effecter offset 3 for initialization. Special: 0x00 as placeholder if not required.

stateValue4.description: uint8; State value to write to effecter offset 4 for initialization. Special: 0x00 as placeholder if not required.

stateValue5.description: uint8; State value to write to effecter offset 5 for initialization. Special: 0x00 as placeholder if not required.

stateValue6.description: uint8; State value to write to effecter offset 6 for initialization. Special: 0x00 as placeholder if not required.

stateValue7.description: uint8; State value to write to effecter offset 7 for initialization. Special: 0x00 as placeholder if not required.
